Liono:Thanks Suukie But in a sense I've learned something that as long as I 
fight the preds and others fight them too I'm never alone. Just like with 
hellbeast there is nothing he can do to me besides kill me and make story 
even greater cause I believe in myself and believe in my dreams and that's 
all that really matters. When I do go it alone as long as I live everyday of 
my life to the fullest then there really is happy ever after out there for 
me. ::equips weapons:: But now I have to prove that. Can you help tigerhawk 
and Grimlock. 

Tigerhawk: ::drops to one knee:: i can't take much more of this grimlock 
hurry up and waste him

Liono: Leaves a Note in Keys chamber I'm going to take to hellbeast one last 
time ::Beastmode exits maximals base heading towards the preds main base:: 
I'm going to beat him no elements no tricks the council will not be please if 
I hold up to him it will disgrace him in front of them.
